name: IMP vs CID
description:
Take control of the IMP (my bro's character) to save the Hyperverse from the crazy demon known as the CID in this interactive text game. The IMP is well versed in dealing with beings from across the dimensions, but he might be biting off more than he can chew this time.

This game was made in 2020 for my brother's birthday. Hope you enjoy it.
